summary:
We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list.

We need to infer from class docstring: EvapotranspirationRegridMethod: object containing regridder methods for Evapotranspiration package. Provides custom settings for regrid_like method. Parameters: surface, rate, depth, proportion_rate, proportion_depth each tuple default (RegridderType.OVERLAP, "mean") etc. So class holds configuration for regridding of evapotranspiration data (surface, rate, depth, etc.) using different regridder types (OVERLAP, BARYCENTRIC, etc.) and methods (mean, max). It is used to customize regridding.

Thus summary: class encapsulates regridding configuration for evapotranspiration variables, allowing specification of regridder type and aggregation method per variable.

Business intent: Provide flexible, reusable regridding settings for evapotranspiration modeling, enabling users to apply custom interpolation/aggregation when aligning data to different spatial grids.

Keywords: regridding, evapotranspiration, interpolation, spatial aggregation, configuration, regridder type, modeling, GIS, data transformation.

Make JSON.

Check constraints: Do NOT list method names verbatim. So we shouldn't mention method names like regrid_like? It's okay to mention concept but not verbatim? The instruction: "Do NOT list method names verbatim." Means we should avoid enumerating method names like "regrid_like". We can refer to "regridding operation" etc.

Let's craft summary: "Encapsulates customizable regridding settings for evapotranspiration components (surface, rate, depth, proportion) allowing selection of regridder type and aggregation method."

Business intent: "Enable users of the evapotranspiration modeling package to easily apply consistent, configurable spatial regridding when mapping model outputs onto different target grids."

Keywords list: ["regridding", "evapotranspiration", "spatial interpolation", "aggregation method", "configuration", "grid transformation", "model output", "GIS", "data resampling"].

Return JSON.

Make sure JSON keys exactly: summary, business_intent, keywords.

Let's produce.assistantfinal{"summary":"Encapsulates configurable regridding settings for evapotranspiration variables (surface, rate, depth, proportion) allowing selection of regridder type and aggregation method per variable.","business_intent":"Provide a flexible way for evapotranspiration modeling users to apply consistent, customizable
